name: Clock Work (Phil Johnson)
description:
A short game about finding an exit from mundanity. Sometimes life can feel like little more than one big routine; it's important to break up the monotony now and again. Made using FlickGame, a simple and charming game making tool that I just found out about recently. There are two endings in total, so try to get both if you can! Either way, thanks for playing!

Music used is 2 (jazz) by HoliznaCC0.
